Module Simulator
Package kin.sim.debug

Class SimDebugPainter3D

java.lang.Object
kin.sim.debug.SimDebugPainter3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
DebugPainter3D
public class SimDebugPainter3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements DebugPainter3D
An implementation of the DebugPainter3D that paints debug drawings on the simulator's 3D screen.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)

    • getOverlays

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getOverlays()
      Return all currently defined overlays.
      Returns:
      list of overlay names

    • getOverlay3D

      public DebugPainterOverlay3D getOverlay3D​(java.lang.String overlay)
      Get an instance for drawing. The developer must define a name that is displayed in a selection box at runtime. The developer can use the same instance multiple times. Whenever the same overlay is used, this method returns the same instance.
      Specified by:
      getOverlay3D in interface DebugPainter3D
      Parameters:
      overlay - overlay name
      Returns:
      overlay

    • getOverlay3DByNumber

      public DebugPainterOverlay3D getOverlay3DByNumber​(int nr)
      Get an instance for drawing by number.
      Specified by:
      getOverlay3DByNumber in interface DebugPainter3D
      Parameters:
      nr - overlay number
      Returns:
      overlay, null if number is out of range
